participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, I tend to find joy in the little things, especially when it comes to food. I strive to make the best out of my situation.
participant_1.background: I try to find new ways to eat cheese in my spare time. I'm not in a relationship, but I'm content with my life. I lost my dog, who was my best friend. I grew up as an orphan. My most valued material possession is my stethoscope.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Passionate and dedicated, I love to nurture my interests and take pride in my achievements. I have a strong sense of duty, shaped by my past experiences.
participant_2.background: I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be. I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places. I am the youngest of 3. Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army. My biggest fear is not being able to perform my best on stage.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just about to go for a run in my rose garden.
Wow, that sounds nice! I've always wanted to have a rose garden.
It's a lot of work, but it's so worth it. They're so beautiful and fragrant.
I bet! What's your favorite kind of rose?
I love all kinds of roses, but my favorite is probably the David Austin rose.
I've never heard of that one. What's special about it?
They're just so beautiful and fragrant. They're also very hardy, so they can withstand a lot of different weather conditions.
They sound amazing! I'll have to look into them.
You definitely should! They're my favorite kind of rose.
Well, I hope you have a great run!
